question: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) is to set up an expert committee on which category of banks?
explanation:
The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has decided to set up an expert committee on Urban Co-operative Banks (UCBs) involving all stakeholders.
The Committee would prepare a road map to strengthen the sector, enable faster resolution of UCBs. In 2020, the Urban Co-operative Banks (UCBs) and Multi-State Co-operative Banks were brought under the supervisory power of the Reserve Bank of India (RBI).
